tool.name: ecomet_species_marchantia
tool.description: Exemplary annotation of MS1 features in the profile of Marchantia polymorpha
tool.help:
========================= Eco-Metabolomics workflow =========================
This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes.
Module | Species Marchantia |
Description | Exemplary annotation of MS1 features in the profile of Marchantia polymorpha |
----- Input -----
Input Rdata | Rdata file |
------ Output ------
Marchantia polymorpha profile | PDF plot |
---------------------------------------------------
.. class:: infomark
**Authors**
For updates and documentation, please visit **https://github.com/korseby/container-mtbls520** or contact **Kristian Peters (kpeters@ipb-halle.de)**.
